tasks.description: Auto-deploy built into subagent protocol + task poller handles all dashboard deploys

tasks.title: Dashboard Enhancement v2
tasks.description: Nav bar, fitness integration, vertical layout, unified data, live rendering, assignee dropdowns, notes, review checkbox, task poller

tasks.title: Nightly Pipeline Reliability
tasks.description: sync_data.sh timeouts added, duplicate Garmin sync removed, watchdog cron active

tasks.title: WHOOP Day Strain Bug

tasks.title: Telegram Summary Fixes
tasks.description: Fixed Speediance loader, recovery key mismatch, added lifting strain

tasks.title: Dashboard v1 Build
tasks.description: 17 tasks: schemas, CSS, templates, renderers, server, deploy — all complete

tasks.title: Fitness Report Defect Fixes
tasks.description: Email sleep bug, telegram recovery data, historical report refs

tasks.title: Sage Dashboard QA Review
tasks.description: Reviewed all 17 dashboard deliverables, found 3 critical bugs

tasks.title: Dark Mode Theme Customizer
tasks.description: Add a theme customizer to adjust dashboard accent colors, font sizes, and dark mode intensity.

tasks.title: Agent Status Health Indicators
tasks.description: Add visual health indicators (CPU, memory, uptime) to agent status cards with real-time updates.

tasks.title: Fitness Data Heatmap Calendar
tasks.description: Integrate a heatmap calendar to visualize daily strain, sleep, and recovery trends over months.
tasks.notes: Fitness Data Heatmap Calendar Preview link is broken (this needs to actually work)

tasks.title: Automated Task Prioritization
tasks.description: Use agent workload and fitness data to auto-prioritize tasks based on user energy levels.

tasks.title: Voice-Controlled Dashboard Navigation
tasks.description: Enable voice commands for navigating the dashboard and triggering agent actions.

tasks.title: Agent Collaboration Mode
tasks.description: Enable agents to collaborate on tasks in real-time with shared context and progress tracking.

tasks.title: Fitness Goal Progress Widget
tasks.description: Add a widget to track progress toward weekly/monthly fitness goals (e.g., strain, sleep, recovery).

tasks.title: Automated Error Recovery for Agents
tasks.description: Implement self-healing mechanisms for agents to recover from crashes or timeouts automatically.

tasks.title: Customizable Dashboard Layouts
tasks.description: Allow users to save and switch between multiple dashboard layouts (e.g., fitness-focused, task-focused).

tasks.title: Real-Time Notification Center
tasks.description: Add a notification center to display real-time alerts for agent actions, fitness milestones, and task updates.

tasks.title: Sleep Quality Deep Dive
tasks.description: Add a detailed sleep analysis view with breakdowns of sleep stages, disturbances, and recovery impact.

tasks.title: Agent Performance Benchmarking
tasks.description: Add benchmarking tools to compare agent performance across tasks and optimize resource allocation.

tasks.title: Fitness Data Export API
tasks.description: Create an API to export fitness data (WHOOP, Garmin, 8Sleep) in standardized formats (JSON, CSV).

tasks.title: Dashboard Accessibility Audit
tasks.description: Conduct an accessibility audit and implement fixes for screen readers, keyboard navigation, and color contrast.

tasks.title: Automated Daily Briefing
tasks.description: Generate and deliver a daily briefing summarizing tasks, fitness data, and agent activity via voice or text.

tasks.title: Multi-Device Sync for Dashboard
tasks.description: Enable seamless sync of dashboard state and preferences across multiple devices.

tasks.title: Agent Task Time Estimates
tasks.description: Add estimated time-to-completion for tasks based on historical agent performance data.

tasks.title: Fitness Alerts for Overtraining
tasks.description: Implement alerts for overtraining risks based on strain, recovery, and sleep data.

tasks.title: Dashboard Plugin System
tasks.description: Create a plugin system to allow users to add custom widgets, data sources, and integrations.

tasks.title: Agent Workload Balancer
tasks.description: Dynamically redistribute tasks among agents based on current workload and performance metrics.

tasks.title: Historical Trend Charts
tasks.description: Add interactive charts to visualize long-term trends for fitness, productivity, and agent activity metrics.

tasks.title: Cronometer Nutrition Integration Widget
tasks.description: Integrate a widget to display real-time nutrition data (macros, calories, micronutrients) from Cronometer alongside fitness metrics.

tasks.title: Agent Chat/Log Viewer
tasks.description: Create a dedicated interface to view, search, and interact with agent conversations and logs for debugging and transparency.

tasks.title: Mobile-Responsive PWA
tasks.description: Optimize the dashboard for mobile devices, enable PWA installation, and ensure offline functionality for key features.

tasks.title: Webhook Integrations for External Triggers
tasks.description: Enable external services to trigger dashboard actions (e.g., task creation, fitness logging) via webhook endpoints.

tasks.title: Remove Titan from System
tasks.description: Remove Titan agent from SUBAGENTS.md, MEMORY.md, dashboard.json, kanban template, and gateway config.

tasks.title: Replace Review checkbox with Approve button
tasks.description: Remove the checkbox on Review cards. Replace with a green Approve button (styled like the reject button but green #238636) positioned right above the reject button.

tasks.title: Simplify Add Task form — auto-generate titles
tasks.description: Remove the title input from the Add Task form. Only show description and assignee. If status is "To Do", auto-generate a short title from the first ~50 chars of description. If status is "To Approve", set title to "(to generate)". Remove the "(optional)" label from description.

tasks.title: Add agent emoji to assignee dropdowns
tasks.description: All assignee dropdowns (add task form, To Approve cards) should show emoji next to agent names: 🌸 ARIA, 🔍 Clarity, 💙 Sage, ⚡ Spark, 👁️ Vision, 🌊 Pulse, 🤖 Clawd, 🔧 BOB.

tasks.title: Add Backlog button to To Approve cards
tasks.description: Add a "📦 Backlog" button on To Approve cards. When clicked, calls /api/backlog endpoint which sets task status to "Backlog". Add the /api/backlog POST endpoint to local_server.py (same pattern as /api/reject).

tasks.title: Create Backlog page
tasks.description: Create a new Backlog page at /backlog that shows all tasks with status "Backlog". Add a "Backlog" link to the nav bar (after Kanban, before Fitness). Style consistently with existing pages. Each backlog card should have a "Restore → To Approve" button.

tasks.title: Replace due_date with ETA estimate
tasks.description: Change the due_date field concept to an ETA time-till-completion estimate (e.g., "~2 hours", "~30 min"). Display on cards as "⏱️ ~2 hours" instead of a calendar date. Update the add-task form if it has a date field.

tasks.title: Dashboard agent status from kanban data
tasks.description: The main dashboard page should read kanban.json to determine agent status. If an agent has any task with status "In Progress", show that agent as "active" with the task title. Otherwise show "idle". Do not rely on manually-set status in dashboard.json.

tasks.title: Activity log from kanban task movements
tasks.description: The dashboard activity log should be generated from kanban task status changes rather than manually maintained. Track when tasks move between columns and show entries like "Clarity picked up: Task Title" or "Spark completed: Task Title". Store movement history in kanban.json or a separate file.

tasks.description: Persistence already implemented. Verify AsyncStorage persist actually works end-to-end: add a food entry, hard-refresh, confirm it survives. Fix partialize config if not.

tasks.title: Fix FoodSearch to properly add foods to diary
tasks.description: Fix the Home → FoodSearch → AddFood → Diary flow. Verify navigation params, store addEntry() calls, and Diary display all work end-to-end.

tasks.title: Fix BarcodeScanner for web platform
tasks.description: Replace expo-barcode-scanner (crashes on web) with a Platform-aware component: manual UPC text input on web, camera scanner on native.

tasks.title: Fix Diary screen - entries display and delete
tasks.description: Fix Diary screen to show food entries grouped by meal (Breakfast/Lunch/Dinner/Snacks) with delete functionality and running calorie totals.

tasks.title: Fix RecipeBuilder screen
tasks.description: Fix RecipeBuilder: ingredient search, adding items to recipe, nutrition aggregation, and saving to store.

tasks.title: Fix Profile and Onboarding save/load
tasks.description: Fix Onboarding to save user data (name, age, weight, height, calorie goal) and Profile screen to read and display it persistently.

tasks.title: Fix Biometrics screen - weight tracking
tasks.description: Fix Biometrics screen: log body weight entries with dates, display history list, persist data across refresh.

tasks.title: Fix Trends screen - charts and data display
tasks.description: Fix Trends screen: pull diary history from nutritionStore, group by date, render calorie and macro trend charts.

tasks.title: Fix NutritionSummary screen
tasks.description: Fix NutritionSummary: aggregate daily totals from diary entries and display calories/protein/carbs/fat vs user goals.

tasks.title: Final NutriTrack integration test
tasks.description: Full end-to-end integration test: expo export must have 0 errors, all 10+ screens must load and function, persistence confirmed.

tasks.title: Fix bjjStore calculateStreak bug
tasks.description: Real bug: updateSession calls state.calculateStats() inside a set() callback — nested set() with Immer. Fix: replace with inline state.stats = computeStats(state.sessions) like addSession does.

tasks.title: Add AsyncStorage persistence to bjjStore
tasks.description: Persistence already implemented with AsyncStorage. Verify sessions, stats, and belt history all survive refresh. Check partialize config includes all needed fields.

tasks.title: Add AsyncStorage persistence to techniqueStore
tasks.description: AsyncStorage persist already in place. Verify no raw localStorage calls remain (grep -r localStorage). Test favorites persist across refresh.

tasks.title: Fix BJJLog session creation and save
tasks.description: Fix BJJLogScreen: session form (date, duration, gi/nogi, intensity, notes) must save to bjjStore.addSession() and appear in progress view.

tasks.title: Fix BJJProgress stats display
tasks.description: Fix BJJProgressScreen: display total sessions, current streak (using fixed bug), belt timeline, and milestones from bjjStore.

tasks.title: Fix TechniqueLibrary search and favorites
tasks.description: Fix TechniqueLibrary: browse by category, real-time search, favorite toggle (with persistence), and technique detail view.

tasks.title: Fix Home screen and Profile for BJJ Buddy
tasks.description: Fix BJJ Buddy Home (training summary, streak, milestones) and Profile (belt level, gym, training goals — editable and persistent).

tasks.title: Final BJJ Buddy integration test
tasks.description: Full end-to-end integration test: expo export 0 errors, all BJJ screens functional, persistence and stats confirmed across refresh.

tasks.title: Speediance Dashboard — Fitness Report Integration
tasks.description: Add Speediance dashboard link into morning report (Lifting section), nightly report (Lifting section), lifting_recovery_report, and index.html Strength section. URL: http://192.168.1.226:8084/speediance_dashboard.html (LAN) and GitHub Pages URL once deployed.

tasks.title: Universal Nav Strip — All Report HTML Templates
tasks.description: Add a consistent top navigation bar to every report HTML (morning, nightly, lifting, historical). Nav links: Home (index.html), Today's Calendar, Speediance Dashboard, Current Month Calendar. Must be added to Jinja templates so future reports inherit it automatically. No data loss — additive only.

tasks.title: Calendar Nightly Cron — Verify & Fix Path
tasks.description: Verify the calendar generation step in generate_reports.sh --nightly works correctly. Check that output path matches what index.html links to. Run the calendar script manually for Feb 2026, confirm the output file lands in ~/clawd/docs/calendars/ (or wherever the index expects). Fix any broken paths.

tasks.title: Historical Calendar Regeneration — All Months with Data
tasks.description: Regenerate all historical monthly calendars (Nov 2025 – Feb 2026) using the current Jinja calendar template. Ensures all past calendars use the latest day format. Output to ~/clawd/docs/calendars/. Deploy via deploy_github.sh afterward.

tasks.title: Morning Pipeline Smoke Test — Ready for Tomorrow
tasks.description: Run each morning phase script in validation mode and confirm no broken imports, wrong paths, or errors. Scripts to check: sync_data.sh --morning (dry), generate_reports.sh --morning, send_triple_voice.sh --morning, send_notifications.sh --morning. Fix any discovered breakages. Confirm the new voice summary script loads correctly.

tasks.title: Nightly Pipeline Smoke Test — Ready for Tomorrow
tasks.description: Validate all nightly phase scripts: sync_data.sh --nightly, generate_reports.sh --nightly (including calendar step), send_triple_voice.sh --nightly, send_notifications.sh --nightly. Confirm the enhanced nightly voice summary generates correctly with real data. Fix any issues.

tasks.title: Deploy Speediance Dashboard to GitHub Pages
tasks.description: Copy ~/clawd/data/speediance_dashboard.html and ~/clawd/data/speediance_exercise_history.json to ~/clawd/docs/. Add entry to index.html under Strength section. Deploy via deploy_github.sh. Confirm accessible at tobyglenn.github.io/fitness/speediance_dashboard.html.

tasks.title: Report-to-Report Navigation — Morning ↔ Nightly ↔ Calendar Links
tasks.description: Add cross-report links at the bottom of each HTML report: morning report links to tonight's nightly (when it exists) and the month calendar; nightly report links to the next morning report and month calendar; both link to index.html. Must survive daily report generation without overwrite.

tasks.title: Voice Summary End-to-End Test (Morning + Nightly)
tasks.description: Run generate_voice_summary.py for both morning and nightly modes against 2026-02-18 data. Confirm correct text generation, TTS audio creation, and Telegram send would succeed (use --dry-run if available or test send to test chat). Log any errors. Confirm the strain baseline fix is correct.

tasks.title: Overnight Work — Initial QA Review (Sage)
tasks.description: Sage reviews all tasks 137–145 completed overnight. For each task: (1) Verify the implementation exists and is correct, (2) Spot-check no data was lost or files overwritten, (3) Flag any issues for Toby's morning review. Mark each as Done if approved or flag with specific concern. Run at 6:30 AM before Toby sees results.
